long_description: shelgin partners is a national recruitment agency. the agency is based in st. our agency specializes in sales, marketing, and management positions but have the experience and capabilities to manage the whole process for an employer on a local or national basis. our team is committed to matching client needs to candidate strengths. we strive to build long-term partnerships based on strong ethics that produce results with our clients. specialties: educational, advertising, business solutions, consumer products, diagnostics, document management/print, engineering, financial, industrial/manufacturing, medical, human resources, payroll services, pharmaceutical, and technology. michele learns the business and specific needs of each client and sets out in a very systematic and targeted approach for talent acquisition. gerri lynn zschetzsche has 10 years recruiting experienc. specialized services: strategic recruitment consulting candidate sourcing candidate matching candidate screening candidate selecting permanent placement temp-to-hire placement temporary placement.
generated_description: shelgin partners is a national recruitment agency based in lake saint louis, missouri. founded by michele white and gerri lynn zschetzsche, the company specializes in sales, marketing, and management positions. shelgin partners offers a range of recruitment services including direct recruitment, advertising, employee referrals, partnerships with other recruiting agencies, online advertising, and job fairs. the agency serves various industries such as educational, advertising, business solutions, consumer products, diagnostics, document management, engineering, financial, industrial/manufacturing, medical, human resources, payroll services, pharmaceutical, and technology.
